abstract: Newsweek’s app seems to sidestep a frustration that magazines have had with Apple’s device, but it’s not clear whether other publishers will see it as an attractive solution.
snippet: Newsweek’s app seems to sidestep a frustration that magazines have had with Apple’s device, but it’s not clear whether other publishers will see it as an attractive solution.
lead_paragraph: Newsweek released an  iPad application this week that allows readers to buy subscriptions using Apple’s in-app purchasing system, seemingly resolving a major frustration that magazine publishers have had with the iPad.

headline.main: Newsweek Offers iPad App With Subscription Option
